name: hourly
description: Hourly - Aplicaci√≥n web de control de horas de trabajo para freelancers

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy public
scripts.db:migrate: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply hourly-db --local
scripts.db:migrate:prod: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply hourly-db
scripts.db:studio: npx wrangler d1 execute hourly-db --local --command='SELECT * FROM users'
